title: The Last game
brief_description: An interactive CD-ROM following a ‘pick-a-path’ approach to a soccer player’s last match. A range of outcomes are generated in reaction to key elememts of a typical football game - penalty kick, injury, extra time. The CD-ROM attempts to describe the possible emotions of the player as he experiences the last game of his career.
